mdRecord.dcterms:description: Various graffitis with advice about what classes NOT to take, various responses [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
DO NOT TAKE ECON355 | easy | Or Astronomy 121 | or ENMC312 | CHEM 204 | quit school | true dat | of HIEM355 | or HISA1501 | or college | Drop out of college | best idea
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Education, Higher
